entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 p.m. PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 3:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
Temperature: 7.8°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: 7.0°C
Wind: SSE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
